title: Episode 43: The Wrong Side of the Language of History

media:group.media:title: Episode 43: The Wrong Side of the Language of History
media:group.media:description:
When moral absolutes not only infuse the language of history, but dominate it, there are consequences.

Jon Meacham in Time Magazine, "American Hate, A History", August 17, 2017 https://time.com/4904290/american-hate-a-history/

Joe Biden in The Atlantic, "We Are Living Through a Battle for the Soul of This Nation", August 27, 2017 https://www.theatlantic.com/politics/archive/2017/08/joe-biden-after-charlottesville/538128/

President Biden's nomination speech, August 21, 2020 https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/20/politics/biden-dnc-speech-transcript/index.html

President Biden's victory speech, November 7, 2020 https://apnews.com/article/election-2020-joe-biden-religion-technology-race-and-ethnicity-2b961c70bc72c2516046bffd378e95de

President Biden's inaugural address, January 20, 2021 https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/speeches-remarks/2021/01/20/inaugural-address-by-president-joseph-r-biden-jr/

Ken Burns on the SmartLess Podcast, September 2021 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ken-burns/id1521578868?i=1000535978926

Jon Meacham's HBO documentary, "The Soul of America" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RHv1GbkRhSI
